Text: HNoMS Nordkapp:  She was launched 18 August 1937 at Horten naval shipyard, with yard number 123.

Triplets:<HNoMS Nordkapp

Text: HNoMS Nordkapp:  She had one sister ship, HNoMS "Senja".

<Text: HNoMS Nordkapp:  "Nordkapp" sailed throughout the Second World War and saw service in several theatres.>
